bike.description: Full high modulus carbon fiber, Dyad XC Ultra lay-up, shaped-optimized top and down tubes, 1.5 - 1 1/8" tapered head tube, SST tubing diameters, PressFit30 BB shell, asymmetrical chainstays, stainless steel chainstay protector, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Rock Shox SID RLT 29er, 15mm Maxle Lite, Motion Control damping, lockout lever, External rebound, low speed compression to JAMIS_SINGLEQUOTElockJAMIS_SINGLEQUOTE with external Floodgate, tapered alloy steerer, 100mm travel
FSA Orbit 1.5 Zero-Stack internal cup, for tapered head tube, 30mm shim stack
American Classic Tubeless 29 Disc with AC130 15mm thru-axle front & AC 225 rear hubs, AC butted spokes & alloy nipples
SRAM XO mid cage rear and XO 34.9mm dual pull front
Ritchey WCS Carbon flat bar, 31.8 x 10JAMIS_DEGREE x 660mm
Ritchey WCS carbon 1-bolt, 31.6 x 400mm, with alloy clamp and cromo seatpin
WTB Silverado Team, NiCro tubular rails
